sql.trim: a.id AS "id", a.master_data_type_id AS "masterDataTypeId.", a.filed_code AS "filedCode", a.data_key AS "dataKey", a.filed_name AS "filedName", a.filed_type AS "filedType", a.filed_size AS "filedSize", a.filed_precision AS "filedPrecision", a.required AS "required", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag",

mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN master_data_type masterDataType ON masterDataType.id = a.master_data_type_id
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM standard_field a
1=1 AND a.id > 0 AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
